hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# ssh key setup SSH_KEY_DIR=$(mktemp -dt ssh.XXXXXXXX) SSH_KEY_FILE="${SSH_KEY_DIR}/id_rsa" SSH_KNOWNHOSTS="${SSH_KEY_DIR}/known_hosts" function cleanup { echo "Performing cleanup" [ ! -d "${SSH_KEY_DIR}" ] || rm -rf "${SSH_KEY_DIR}" } trap cleanup EXIT echo "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----" > "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" echo ${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_SSH_KEY} | sed "s/ /\n/g" >> "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" echo "-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----" >> "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" chmod 600 "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" ssh-keygen -y -f "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" > "${SSH_KEY_DIR}/id_rsa.pub"
if [ "true" = "${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_DOCKER_PULLS:-true}" ] ; then echo "Pulling latest calyptos docker image" docker pull sjones4/calyptos:4.4 fi
echo "Calculating param string" HOST_PARAMS="CPU" while [ ${HOST_PARAM_CPU} -ge 4 ] ; do HOST_PARAMS="${HOST_PARAMS}X" HOST_PARAM_CPU=$((HOST_PARAM_CPU / 2)) done HOST_PARAMS="${HOST_PARAMS}:DISKX:MEM" while [ ${HOST_PARAM_MEM} -ge 8 ] ; do HOST_PARAMS="${HOST_PARAMS}X" HOST_PARAM_MEM=$((HOST_PARAM_MEM / 2)) done HOST_PARAMS="${HOST_PARAMS}:USEX" echo "Host params ${HOST_PARAMS}"
echo "Host status" docker run --rm \ -v "${SSH_KEY_DIR}":/root/.ssh \ -v $(pwd)/hosts:/calyptos/hosts \ -w /calyptos/hosts \ sjones4/calyptos:4.4 host-status.sh
echo "Reserving ${HOST_COUNT} host(s)" docker run --rm \ -v "${SSH_KEY_DIR}":/root/.ssh \ -v $(pwd)/hosts:/calyptos/hosts \ -w /calyptos/hosts \ sjones4/calyptos:4.4 host-reserve.sh \ ${BUILD_USER_ID}-${BUILD_ID} ${BUILD_USER_EMAIL} ${HOST_COUNT} ${HOST_PARAMS} \ > hosts/reserved_hosts.txt && \ echo "${BUILD_USER_ID}-${BUILD_ID}" > hosts/reservation_id.txt
if [ $? -ne 0 ] ; then [ ! -f hosts/reserved_hosts.txt ] || rm -fv hosts/reserved_hosts.txt [ ! -f hosts/reserved_host_names.txt ] || rm -fv hosts/reserved_host_names.txt [ ! -f hosts/reserved_public_ip_ranges.txt ] || rm -fv hosts/reserved_public_ip_ranges.txt [ ! -f hosts/reserved_private_ip_ranges.txt ] || rm -fv hosts/reserved_private_ip_ranges.txt [ ! -f hosts/reservation_id.txt ] || rm -fv hosts/reservation_id.txt else grep -f hosts/reserved_hosts.txt hosts/hosts.txt | cut -d _ -f 2 > hosts/reserved_host_names.txt grep -f hosts/reserved_hosts.txt hosts/hosts.txt | cut -d _ -f 3 > hosts/reserved_public_ip_ranges.txt grep -f hosts/reserved_hosts.txt hosts/hosts.txt | cut -d _ -f 4 > hosts/reserved_private_ip_ranges.txt fi
